net_op.concept: The Virtuoso; a techy, goth, cyberpunk musician and micro-celebrity.

talent.name: Signal Sweep
talent.description: When making a non-skill Brains check for intuition, she gains cryptic insight on a success.

power.name: Float Shoes
power.description: Can move over empty spaces on the board.

chip_folder.effect: Hits the enemy directly in front of you 3 times in rapid succession.
Strikes in a line, hitting the panel in front of you and the one directly behind it.
Pushes the enemy back one panel.

goals.long_term: Uncover the source of the Net's slow-motion breakdown and restore integrity.
goals.short_term_1: Gain a Patron: Secure a regular, high-paying contract.
goals.short_term_2: Upgrade StarGirl: Install a NaviCust program.
